title: LiveJournal XML-RPC + metaWeblog API
summary: Looking at the LiveJournal XML-RPC Protocol Reference again today. I need to make a metaWeblog API gateway to LiveJournal, now that I can supply arbitrary metadata and now include mood and music. Next stop would be to make a client that can exploit metaWeblog that feels like the LJ client.
content:
Looking at the LiveJournal XML-RPC Protocol Reference again today. I need to make a metaWeblog API gateway to LiveJournal, now that I can supply arbitrary metadata and now include mood and music. Next stop would be to make a client that can exploit metaWeblog that feels like the LJ client.
